EmailTemplate.description: for terms collections on US/CAN/INTL terms quotes
EmailTemplate.name: Special Terms Bal Due Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Special Terms Balance Due - {!Quote.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Per your terms agreement, your 50% balance of (${!Opportunity.Balance_Due__c}) is due on {!Opportunity.Balance_Due_Date__c}.
No product will be shipped until the balance due is paid in full regardless of the availability of any product on the order.
Reference the last page of your this balance due invoice for payment details, or contact me with any questions you may have.
Thank you,
{!Opportunity.Ops_Contact__c}
